name: Blackest Jack
description:
BLACKEST JACK, the blackjack battle game.  Currently in pre-alpha.  Please ignore the horrible art.

Normal blackjack rules generally apply, but you deal damage to your opponent by winning hands.  Take extra damage if you go over 21.  Defeat the bosses to gain powers

Man - Deal extra damage when you win a hand

Cooler - the "card destruction" power.  Click on the icon, then on a card to destroy it.  This power can only be used once every 4 hands.

Special Rules

Man - This boss farts and deals damage to you over time.  Defeat him quickly.

Cooler - Click on the missile before they reach the bottom of the screen or they will damage you.
